title: Friday Post Show (03-19-21)
itunes:title: Friday Post Show (03-19-21)
description:
Bobby has Raymundo try out a new intro for the “Post Show”. We decide whether or not that we like it…The first baby was born with the antibodies because their mom had the show. Bobby talks about how amazing Tiera was on the show today and other artists who blew him away. Facebook for kids is coming soon.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
